verses.text: And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* had a \w kinsman|strong="H4129"\w* of her \w husband’s|strong="H0376"\w*, a \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w wealth|strong="H2428"\w*, of the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w*; and his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*.\f + \fr 2.1 \ft Boaz: Gr. Booz\f*

And \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* the \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w*, Let me now \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* ears of \w corn|strong="H7641"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \add him\add* in whose \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* I shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w*. And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

And she \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w*: and her \w hap|strong="H4745"\w* was to \w light|strong="H7136"\w* on a \w part|strong="H2513"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \add belonging\add* unto \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*, who \add was\add* of the \w kindred|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Elimelech|strong="H0458"\w*.\f + \fr 2.3 \ft hap…: Heb. hap happened\f*

¶ And, behold, \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Beth-lehem|strong="H1035"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add be\add* with you. And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* unto his \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* that was \w set|strong="H5324"\w* over the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w*, Whose \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* \add is\add* this?

And the \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* that was \w set|strong="H5324"\w* over the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, It \add is\add* the \w Moabitish|strong="H4125"\w* \w damsel|strong="H5291"\w* that came \w back|strong="H7725"\w* with \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* out of the \w country|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*:

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I pray you, let me \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* and \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w* among the \w sheaves|strong="H6016"\w*: so she \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and hath \w continued|strong="H5975"\w* \w even|strong="H0227"\w* from the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* until now, that she \w tarried|strong="H3427"\w* a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* unto \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w*, \w Hearest|strong="H8085"\w* thou not, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*? \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* not to \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* in \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, neither \w go|strong="H5674"\w* from hence, but \w abide|strong="H1692"\w* here fast by my \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w*:

\add Let\add* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add be\add* on the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* that they do \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* thou \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them: have I not \w charged|strong="H6680"\w* the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* that they shall not \w touch|strong="H5060"\w* thee? and when thou art \w athirst|strong="H6770"\w*, \w go|strong="H1980"\w* unto the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of \add that\add* which the young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* have \w drawn|strong="H7579"\w*.

Then she \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on her \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* herself to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Why have I \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, that thou shouldest take \w knowledge|strong="H5234"\w* of me, seeing I \add am\add* a \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*?

And \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, It hath \w fully|strong="H5046"\w* been \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* me, all that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto thy mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w* \w since|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of thine \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: and \add how\add* thou hast \w left|strong="H5800"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* and thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of thy \w nativity|strong="H4138"\w*, and art \w come|strong="H3212"\w* unto a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which thou \w knewest|strong="H3045"\w* not \w heretofore|strong="H8543"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w recompense|strong="H7999"\w* thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, and a \w full|strong="H8003"\w* \w reward|strong="H4909"\w* be given thee of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, under whose \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*.

Then she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w favour|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*; for that thou hast \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* me, and for that thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w friendly|strong="H3820"\w* unto thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w*, though I be not like unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of thine \w handmaidens|strong="H8198"\w*.\f + \fr 2.13 \ft Let me…: or, I find\f*\f + \fr 2.13 \ft friendly: Heb. to the heart\f*

And \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, At \w mealtime|strong="H6256"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* thou \w hither|strong="H1988"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w dip|strong="H2881"\w* thy \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* in the \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w*. And she \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w beside|strong="H6654"\w* the \w reapers|strong="H7114"\w*: and he \w reached|strong="H6642"\w* her \w parched|strong="H7039"\w* \add corn\add*, and she did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and was \w sufficed|strong="H7646"\w*, and \w left|strong="H3498"\w*.

And when she was risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to \w glean|strong="H3950"\w*, \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* his young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let her \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* even among the \w sheaves|strong="H6016"\w*, and \w reproach|strong="H3637"\w* her not:\f + \fr 2.15 \ft reproach…: Heb. shame her not\f*

And let \w fall|strong="H7997"\w* also \add some\add* of the \w handfuls|strong="H6653"\w* of \w purpose|strong="H7997"\w* for her, and \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \add them\add*, that she may \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* \add them\add*, and \w rebuke|strong="H1605"\w* her not.

So she \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* until \w even|strong="H6153"\w*, and beat \w out|strong="H2251"\w* that she had \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w*: and it was about an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*.

¶ And she took \add it\add* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* what she had \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w*: and she brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to her that she had \w reserved|strong="H3498"\w* after she was \w sufficed|strong="H7648"\w*.

And her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, Where hast thou \w gleaned|strong="H3950"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? and \w where|strong="H0375"\w* \w wroughtest|strong="H6213"\w* thou? \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* be he that did take \w knowledge|strong="H5234"\w* of thee. And she \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w* with whom she had \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* with whom I \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*.

And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* he of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, who hath not left \w off|strong="H5800"\w* his \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* to the \w living|strong="H2416"\w* and to the \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*. And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, The \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* near of \w kin|strong="H7138"\w* unto us, one of our next \w kinsmen|strong="H1350"\w*.\f + \fr 2.20 \ft one of…: or, one that hath right to redeem\f*

And \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* the \w Moabitess|strong="H4125"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me also, Thou shalt keep \w fast|strong="H1692"\w* by my young \w men|strong="H5288"\w*, until they have \w ended|strong="H3615"\w* all my \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

And \w Naomi|strong="H5281"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* her daughter in \w law|strong="H3618"\w*, \add It is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, my \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, that thou go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with his \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w*, that they \w meet|strong="H6293"\w* thee not in any \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 2.22 \ft meet…: or, fall upon thee\f*

So she kept \w fast|strong="H1692"\w* by the \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w* of \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w* to \w glean|strong="H3950"\w* unto the \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* and of \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*; and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with her mother in \w law|strong="H2545"\w*.
